articles.title: At Least 6 Killed in Montana Pileup During Dust Storm
articles.description: More than 20 vehicles were involved after a windstorm caused “near-blackout” conditions, the authorities said.
articles.content: At least six people were killed and others were injured in southern Montana in a major car pileup on Friday afternoon during a windstorm that kicked up dust and caused near-blackout conditions, the a… [+634 chars]

articles.title: Ivana Trump's death ruled an accident, medical examiner says
articles.description: Police had been looking into whether she fell down the stairs.
articles.content:
Her son Eric Trump said it was a very sad day, a very sad day, as he left the home Thursday.
A Czech-born ski racer and businesswoman, Ivana Trump was born Ivana Zelnickova in 1949.

articles.title: Mexico captures infamous drug lord Rafael Caro Quintero

articles.title: 2 arrested in connection with deadly 7-Eleven robberies

articles.title: Biden confronts Saudi crown prince over Khashoggi murder, expects action on energy
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden said on Friday he told Saudi Arabia's Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman he held him responsible for the murder of Washington Post journalist Jamal Khashoggi, shortly after exchanging a fist bump with the kingdom's de facto ruler.

articles.title: Pilot arrested after landing plane on interstate in Missouri
